Review.Contenu: I purchased a ssl certificate that should take 2-2-20 mins to be issued now over 3 days
Purchased an ssl from them, still haven't received. My users are being served on an unsecure site. Terrible service and experience. LOUSY. No obvious way to get a refund.

Review.Titre: I don´t have option to change the…
Review.Contenu: I don´t have option to change the email. I can't recieve the confirmation mail because the error I made when I wrote it.

Review.Titre: It was the most frustrating experience…
Review.Contenu: It was the most frustrating experience I've had.  Only having chat as a means of support for mission critical items.  They need screenshare or phone call.  I will be switching vendors as soon as our terms are up.  The documentation for Exchange is outdated to 2013.  I asked for 2nd level support but was assured the current tech could help.  It would be more helpful if the tech can see what I'm doing and let me know if it's right.  I am still not quite sure if what I did was right or not regarding renewing an ssl for Exchange.

Fearing my account had been hacked following a payment from namecheap.com. Which has since turned out to be a sister company of ssls.comI have been dealing with Oleh K has been extremely rude and patronising towards us. After we first witnessed the issue we contacted PayPal as we wasn't sure. Our account is now being held ransome as they're demanding a $10 fee. Despite evidence the charge back from PayPal is no longer open. We have sent clear screenshots of emails and direct from PayPal to show the case has been dropped now. However Oleh K is unable to understand this resulting in hours of wasted time and stress.

Never go with these people. what we understand they are selling certificate from some one else. so they collect payment from you and other company generate certificate. They have made it so hard to get and install an SSL.After payment certificate generation open for month and no one bother from SSLS.com side. finally we brought certificate from another India Company and all up and running in 10 min.

Complete waste of time. I purchased a cert. Never received it. Requested a refund, they are requiring a pin that is suppose to update every 24 hours that doesn’t. Will not provide me a refund without verification from some fictitious pin that allegedly updates every 24 hours. Stay far away.

Unfortunately, I won't be extending my free trial as the Certificate was just too difficult to install. I am not an expert but I do create my own websites, so I'm familiar with HTML and the file structure. The links to an instruction page just led to blank pages, so I tried finding instructions elsewhere. Got close, but couldn't make it happen. Ended up paying a lot more for an automated Certificate Installation through my service provider.

Terrible experience. I have purchased their SSL certificate due to a lower price. Unfortunately, it turned into a very time consuming and frustrating experience. They were not able to verify our company and requested us to get listed on some private directories first. We don't have any need to get listed in any private directories. We owned the domain for three years and only needed to renew the certificate. The customer support was very rude. I requested a refund. Will continue using Godaddy.

Review.Titre: I would rather get a root canal
Review.Contenu: I just wanted an SSL so that my website would look secure, they came up in the search they looked inexpensive so I said what the heck.  Gosh I wish I would have paid any amount more to get a company that actually has real-time customer service not when we in America are sleeping.  Everything is intentionally cryptic so that you have to hire them to install the certificates.  After 9 days of messing with them and offering money if they would just get it done.  I signed up for Bluehost paid almost same price it was completed in 2 hours, You get exactly what you pay for.  I would rather just sell things door to door then ever deal with this company again.  They just do not even get the idea of customer service...It is probably intentional I don't know but I paid twice for an SSL certificate.

Truly awful.They have made it so hard to get and install an SSL by changing the way they work from 1 email telling me to do something to the next saying sorry we have changed that now.Then they fail to issue the key file and because of that the certificate has to be reissued which means I have to make another DNS change.I have now been passed through 3 customer service staff all of whom take 10 minutes to read notes (30 mins) then say I will have to get someone else to help.Cant even get their own systems to work.In reply to ssls' reply.This just shows what I mean - according to customer support http based validation is no longer available. That is how we started this journey - uploading the directory/file as requested. Validation DID NOT work.Now in response to a complaint more incorrect information is given out. And no I will not provide my phone number etc as I have wasted too much time on this already.

Review.Titre: i didnt expect to get ads for reviews…
Review.Contenu: i didnt expect to get ads for reviews via email.  I get enough junk as it is, searching for likes is not what i want.

Review.Titre: Seems like in incompetence to me.
Review.Contenu: After waiting 3 hours for a reply to my request for help, they could not help me and did not communicate clearly as to why they couldn't help me. Then they told me they could not find my server! I'll be getting a refund. What a waste of time.

Review.Contenu: Worst service ever used for SSL! They stole my money for issuing certs referred for technical issues!

Review.Titre: Unable to install it and can’t get…
Review.Contenu: Unable to install it and can’t get help. Beginning to think I was scammed.
The crt file supplied is not being recognised is a valid file. I have contacted support and had no response.

They wrote me that they decided to stop providing their service to me because of my nationality. I have not chosen it. I was born here, in Russia. This company may use money earned from Russian customers to help people in UA. But instead they have chosen to way of discrimination. They wrote that my guilt is that I have to pay taxes to Russian government. Well, a lot of western companies do the same; they pay taxes to Russian government. Apple, just for instance. But they are not Russians and that's alright. They wrote that my guilt is that I have to pay taxes to Russian government. Well, after this company stopped providing their service to me, do they really believe that I stop pay taxes. Sounds strange.PS After the answer of the vendor (see below) it is clear that they just banned _all_ Russians because as they write "we made a mistake by overlooking those free media organizations... We hope you can understand that we were acting quickly".The vendor acted quickly and just banned all Russians no matter if they are against the war or not. Only because such a customer is Russian.The vendor confirmed that they are rasists acting quickly to discriminate people just because of their ethnicity.They stupidly believe that a banned customer will "fight against this tyranny". Lol, what?! Such a customer will of course just start using another service and that's all.In the answer below you will not find anything about western companies that continue working on Russian market and that continue paying taxes. Do you really think SSLs.com ban them? Absolutely, no. Why? It is clear. They are western companies, they are not Russians - that is why.EU buys Russian gas and Russian oil. They pay to the Russian government. Do you think SSLs.com is going to ban such buyers. Of course, not!Distilled racism.

Review.Titre: This company wanted a honest review
Review.Contenu: This company wanted a honest review - so there's one. They spam people and want reviews from them. I don't recommend !

Review.Titre: Certificate is still not issued after…
Review.Contenu: Certificate is still not issued after almost half a year!!

Review.Contenu: I cancelled my order and am yet to receive a response or a refund.

Review.Titre: I couldn’t download it and they want to…
Review.Contenu: I couldn’t download it and they want to charge $25 to install it, ridiculous

Review.Titre: could not set -up wasted my money

Review.Contenu: It didn't work for me, it can't be activated

Review.Titre: We purchased a number of certs from…
Review.Contenu: We purchased a number of certs from SSLs.comToday one of our certs suddenly expired, though it shows as active till Jan 2021. We got no notification about the expiration and therefore our service was down for 30 minutes.When I contacted their support - they refused to refund any amount for the broken cert. I don't recommend this service.

Buy your certificate at SSLs who passes the purchase to Sectigo... and probably you will get stuck in an absurd and never ending validation process.Despite you do not get your certificate, their refund is made in "SSLs credits". No thanks, I have had enough with my first (and last) time!

Review.Titre: Avoid this company obfuscates its prices and products
Review.Contenu: Purchased what I understood at the time was a multi domain SSL and the prices from the way back machine support that as being the appropriate product given the price paid.  However what was supplied was a single domain SSL even though original the form asked for a primary and secondary set of domains.  Avoid this company and buy from somewhere that clearly indicates product throughout the transaction and in all receipts

I bought an SSL certificate from SSLS.com.  They emailed me 24 hours later saying that payment had failed, and that they would revoke my certificate if I didn't log in and make the payment again.  I did so.  I then saw that the first payment had not failed, and that they had now charged me twice.  They are refusing to refund the first payment.  I have now spent multiple hours dealing with this.  It is not worth my time, but the principal of the matter.  Would never use them again.

Review.Titre: Never buy SSLS company from here and…
Review.Contenu: Never buy SSLS company from here and Sectigo. They will always ask you for 3rd party databases company that can verify your company phone numbers, the worst part if your company, not in the US, the choice that they can suggest are all useless. Would you spend USD 120 for SSL cert but USD 300 plus for a letter from a lawyer? That also not guarantee you get the SSL for the company. I had asked for support for roughly one month and they still can't provide any solution. Well, when the cheap price comes with the cost too.

Review.Titre: This was much more complicated that it…
Review.Contenu: This was much more complicated that it needed to be. We were told by Trustwave that if the certificate expired, it would be a simple process to renew it. That was NOT the case. In the future, we will use another provider for this service.

Review.Titre: First of all you do not get your ssl…
Review.Contenu: First of all you do not get your ssl without get in personal contact to their supplier (they are not doing ssl by them self) on my case supplier needs a confirmation on some homepage (like google business etc.) where they can see your phonenumber. I registered with my private mobilephonenumber (to get easy support if needed) but they do not accept that I do not want to register my own phonenumber to google etc. They have no other way to get confirmed that I am they owner of the order. It is simply just rediculess and I will need to buy somewhere else and not get my money back.

Review.Titre: It's been almost a month since I…
Review.Contenu: It's been almost a month since I purchased the certificate and I still can't get it. Guys, you should never buy a certificate from them, especially if you buy it for a company.They will ask you to register the company in third party databases and then constantly check it so that they will be able to verify the phone number. They will also ask you to send sensitive information like banking statements. And even if you do everything there is no guarantee that you'll get the certificate. And the support will not help you because they are just resellers of certificates from Sectigo.

Review.Titre: This company is a sister company of…
Review.Contenu: This company is a sister company of namecheap.com and they both are scams!  I bought from both companies and both times they couldn't get the SSL Certificate to me via email.  I finally demanded that they give me contact info for their supplier Sectigo and was told by Sectigo customer service, (they have a phone # you can actually speak to a human) that there is nothing that they can do, they do not send emails like SSLs.com and Namecheap.com says they do.  I do not have access to the other ways they tell you to validate your SSL Cert so the only way is via email.  DO NOT BUY FROM SSLs.com or Namecheap.com!!!!  BUYER BEWARE!!
I purchased multi-website package and nothing was installed.  Communication with support was never responded to. I have a feeling I was scammed
Not happy with renewal process.  Very confusing.  Not clear in what I have to do.  Not tech savvy. Make it very simple for people like me.

Review.Titre: SSLs was ok, well that's what I thought.
Review.Contenu: Since learning about the significant differences between SSL and TLS I'm shocked that SSLs describe the difference as: "TLS is a little more secure, so businesses like banks will insist on it, but for most websites it doesn’t make much of a difference"That's a big WOW right there. TLS which superseded SSL in 1999 - so 22 years of cryptographic advancements "doesn't make much of a difference" - that's not only unprofessional, it's dangerous advice and that's why I will never use SSLs again.Also I don't really see the point in paying $100 for something that has an easily superior free certificate via lets encrypt. I was originally persuaded by their "Get exactly the same products for better prices" table on their homepage which conspicuously completely neglected to mention Lets Encrypt - a CA which issues around 2,000,000 certificates daily didn't make the comparison table. So that's the second reason I'll never use SSLs again. Dangerous advice and deceptive advertising.

Review.Titre: Renewal process was a nightmare if…
Review.Contenu: Renewal process was a nightmare if disorganized and broken Systems

Review.Titre: We still did not receive the SSL…
Review.Contenu: We still did not receive the SSL ceriticate

The support is very slow and even the issuing of certificates is extremely slow. They will acknowledge your request, but then leave it there. I am still waiting on my certificate and can't seem to progress further.

Review.Titre: Your site had an incorrect step by step…
Review.Contenu: Your site had an incorrect step by step instruction on importing the files. I finally say at the bottom of a page on how to I could combine the public and private key into a PFX file. You need to fix your step by step web page for IIS server.

Review.Titre: The instructions I get did not allow me…
Review.Contenu: The instructions I get did not allow me to install it right

There is very little help with the purchase decision making process. It’s difficult to know which kind of certificate provides what kind of benefits for the purchase. It’s very hard to distinguish among certificate alternatives. There’s a little explanation of the differences between certificates.  Little explanation of the process involved in purchasing. The handoff to Comodo was horrible, as was the experience with Komodo in dealing with and EV certificate and validation requirements.

They do NOT make it clear that you'll have to do the whole cert reinstall every year before purchasing.  If you look closely, they hint about this for 3+ years, but not for 2 years.  I specifically bought a 2 year cert instead of a 3 year cert in hopes of extending the time I had to hassle with reinstalls, only to find out AFTER they took my money.  UGH.+1 star because at least they include the openssl command line so I don't have to look it up.

Review.Titre: The SSL lock sign does not appear on…
Review.Contenu: The SSL lock sign does not appear on our URL on our web site I was told by your technicien that our web master suppose to made it appear.When I contacted him, he said he could not do it.
They just sell titles, but the service after purchase is @#$%^&. They assume everyone is a techie....

Review.Titre: Too long to receive files for SSL certificat : lost of time..
Review.Contenu: Too long to receive files for SSL certificat : lost of time, lost of money .. dont choose them !

Review.Titre: There was a system issue on this one
Review.Contenu: There was an issue where the system reported a correct validation of an uploaded file, but the certificate never appeared.  Apparently, the validation had to occur on port 80 or 443, but it happened on another port.  The system reported that was OK, but it was not and I had to contact support to find out why.  After that everything was resolved properly.

I received certificate and no help installing it On on my website. When I purchased it last time it was installed automatic and I didn’t have to do anything. I thought since I was renewing my certificate it would continue as normal . You can’t talk with anyone

Review.Titre: Purchasing the ssl package was easy
Review.Contenu: Purchasing the ssl package was easy. Setting up the ssl package difficult and misleading on the site. The instructions were for a open source linux or apache server only and not for a windows server. I could not generate the ssl request on the site following the direction listed. I spent several days off then on to figure it out. For windows servers just go to the setting for adding the ssl and they walk you though it. Then after the ssl is issued there are no instructions for installing it on the windows server. I had to serch the internet to find how to do that. Even after finding it is was difficult to figure on which files to enter as there are 3 sll files to put in on a 3 server purchase. After several days I was able to get it installed and working.

Everything involved with getting the certs was smooth and easy. However I can't seen to install it in a SonicWall nsa 2400 and there doesn't seem to be about to contact anyone to see if I can get help.

So I had a problem where the file name you sent me via email and the one from your site had a slightly different name.  Yes the cert was the same but when I used an identical config file on test and prod machine I got an error.Your price for the ssl was said to be 3.74 but the price when I pick it up will be 5 something.Your email made it dificult to see my cert download.I did not have access to documentation on how to install a cert on windows.All of this seems trivial.  But you are selling a service and you make money when your audience is larger and happier.So your procedures don't make it as easy as it could be for a novice.  You spend 3.74 on a cert and hundreds on research time.So now you could make a great explanation of certs and installation for novice.It must anticipate the readers knowledge , and then it would in "ironically" be worth a "bundle"

Review.Titre: have had trouble getting login info for…
Review.Contenu: have had trouble getting login info for the 3rd day now otherwise ok

Review.Titre: Service was not available in french.

Review.Contenu: while purchasing your product was easy. your customer support was not helpful and your instructions for someone like me were very vague. i was unable to use/implement my purchase from you on the website i bought it for leaving me very frustrated and making me turn to a different option- this is as honest as i can be.

Review.Titre: Instructions could have be clearer for…
Review.Contenu: Instructions could have be clearer for those of us who are not up on all of this.

I got me, my professor and my client to buy ssls from you because you have the most affordable price I found on the internet. My professor and I were also very impressed with your documentation and the very clear written and video instructions on how to solve various issues.

Review.Titre: Awesome Support thanks to help me…
Review.Contenu: Awesome Support thanks to help me configure SSL on different droplets for my one domain.

Review.Titre: It's hard to generate a pfx from the…
Review.Contenu: It's hard to generate a pfx from the files received to install on Windows server.Would be nice to have instructions regarding OpenSSL + the right parameters for Windows Server 2016 (on 2019 it was a bit easier).EDIT: I should have looked more into the SSLs.com documentation, everything was there. I did not notice the online converter mentioned, it would have saved me a lot of time.

The process was a lot smoother than i had expected and the overall web site experience is quite nice. Only quibbles are:- it took me a while to figure out the difference between Positive vs Essential certificates.- it took some time for my DNS to refresh and SSLs.com kept on showing an error instead of telling me that waiting 10mn or so was common. The instructions for the testing tool weren't clear either.- the SSL files (key, certificate and chain) came in what i felt were non-standard names, so i had to rename them with .PEM extensions and so on to make this work in some environments.

Review.Titre: SSLs certificate works on Hostnet.nl subdomain
Review.Contenu: I have a website(joomla) in a subdomain hosted by "hostnet.nl".I bought an SSLs.com certificate and I installed the certificate within one hour. Yes I made mistakes such as wrong mailadres, trying the installation advices from Hostnet.nl. But if you follow the SSLs.com directions you will get there.
Excellent service.  Process is a bit confusing but they walk you through it.

Review.Titre: SSL certificate for accessing local OpenVPN server
Review.Contenu: I needed an SSL certificate to locally access an OpenVPN server. The SSL certificate provided me access; howver, I did not complete all the steps to make the certificate useful for external access. Each of my devices I use to access my OpenVPN server had to have the three certificates installed as trusted. Operates fine at this time. Later, I might install the certificates in a manner which will allow me to access web pages on my server using https protocol.Hosting OpenVPN on Ubuntu using Apache. Acessing from MacOS, iOS, Windows, Android and linux.
It was smooth, efficient and an excellent value. I made an error and need a refund. I requested it and received it quickly. I redid the order and now everything is working perfectly.

Review.Titre: easy to flow the topics i needed
Review.Contenu: i was able to get the information i was looking for without any issues. Thanks

I've worked you your company before for some of my old clients.I just have one point where you could improve.Sending with all file a certificate that already has de full stack for us to avoid having to do cat public.key public.bundle.crt  > public.bundle.key and then verify if the line creak between the first file and the bundle is there.The rest everything is quite nice in your service.RegardsJoao
Is very good. Pretty costly and if you don’t have anual certificates, is time consuming task, but, anyway, good service.

Review.Titre: Explanations on how to set everything…
Review.Contenu: Explanations on how to set everything up are very clear and straightforward. Everything went smoothly and very fast.

Scammer websiteOrder #73408829I paid for the order on 14 Apr 2021. Their payment processor was being a pain for whatever reason and for that reason, my money got debited from my bitcoin wallet, but the order was never marked as completed. I opened a ticket at their support - #VHR-714-40320 and they told me that my transaction was missing confirmations. The transaction was confirmed over a day or so ago at that point and they still refused to manually review my payment or give me the bitcoin transaction hash so that I could monitor the transaction on my end too. When asked for bitcoin hash, I was provided "The transaction ID in question is 5NwcP2D5YZrrvUoe2U9KQz. " as response. To this date, my order has not been completed and I still have not received my SSL certificate. Overall, I definitely would NOT recommend this website for your SSL certificate needs. Mind you, this was my second order with this website, and well, I am disappointed to waste 60 bucks over nothing.PS: And my ticket has been marked as resolved and their support staff is not helpful at all and do not understand my concern.------------------------------------------------------It took some time but thank you, this issue was resolved, apologies for not updating the feedback on time. I was refunded back to my wallet. I am unhappy with the experience and the fact that I had to use trustpilot to have this issue resolved but whatever.
Fast response.Problem solved.

The Best price and easy to use
Review.Contenu: SSLS.com offered the best price and the process was also so easy. NAy one can use the website to buy the SSLs.

Product ID 	Status 	check status / switch DCV method#em3xm7Pending 	Waiting for order ID... SSL: error:0B080074:x509 certificate routines:X509_check_private_key:key values mismatch)cannot sync keys, stalled activation, etconly 365 days validdegradation of the serviceinfinite loop of mismatching and chasing private certs with public key

At first, ssls.com has a fancy GUI, and it's easy to use. Instructions are very clear and although we are on Cherokee-webserver (some kind of NGINX-derivate) it was easy to install. Only one thing to think about: The "organization validation" should not be with a "public database" where the original source is unknown and in some cases, the public data is somewhat outdated (addresses, phone numbers).In comparison with other SSL providers (and not at least by price), ssls.com is the best so far.

Review.Titre: Not so bad as described in old posts
Review.Contenu: I wanted to try this service because of value/money but unfortunately read a lot of negative feedbacks about great delay in certification issued process for most high verified type of certificates. In my case everything was reasonable and I've received cert as expected

Review.Titre: They are ok as a shop mabe not very…
Review.Contenu: They are ok as a shop mabe not very explicit on how to install the certificate but the support is absolutely fabulous they help you out every time you need, so no worries your certificate will get installed, prices are ok.Happy shopping

Review.Titre: Price is the best thing about these…
Review.Contenu: Price is the best thing about these certificates. The good thing is that they get "green lock", but it's not like there are no problems. There was a problemcertificate chain. It took me a few hours to figure out.

hello I have bought an ssl certificate. There is no problem for the moment.Only, it's difficult to find your website and it's not easy to use it. I think it will be better if you improve UI/UX interface.Cordially

I was dubious about buying such cheap SSL certificates from an unknown source, but as they were so cheap (4 years for less than £15) I thought I would give them a go, half expecting it to be a scam. When I passed the certificates on to my webmaster, they got back to me saying that the certificates were invalid, at which point I was pretty sure I had been scammed, especially as I had since read a few scathing reviews. However, I'm glad I persevered, as it was just a problem with the validation process. It took a few emails back and forth between my webmaster and SSls.com before we finally got it sorted out, but it was worth the little bit of extra work to get SSL certs at such an amazing price. SSLs.com customer service team were really quick to respond to my emails and sort it out as well. If you're willing to put in the work, I would highly recommend.
Support is good, processing time is slow... if you are renewing at the end of your period, know you will be disrupted for many days...

Review.Titre: SSLs.com is a great resource for…
Review.Contenu: SSLs.com is a great resource for reasonably priced certs. Service is excellent and the purchase process is hassle free.
Very good. Easy to install and more helpful with cheapest one. Customer support team are more friendly

I recently used SSLs.com for securing my website, and I must say that I was highly impressed with their service. The process was quick and efficient, and the quality of service was excellent. I had my SSL certificate up and running in no time. Overall, a great experience with SSLs.com!
Best SSL Certificate Provider and I always selecte SSLs.com for my own websites and all of our clients' website and easy to use and very good experience working with them.

Review.Contenu: Staff are always great and well informed.Would recommend every time. Only problem is expensive when letsencrypt is free.

Review.Titre: I have used SSLs.com in the past to get certs.

I took the free trial of SSLs 1 year cerificates - which was a brilliant idea. I may have had second thoughts if I'd have had to pay for 5 years upfront with an untested cert.Anyway - long story short, the new Cert was installed in under 10 mins from receiving the download and now I don't have to worry about anything for a whole 12 months - pure bliss for under $4/year. Get yours now before the offer price ends (assuming it will end at some point)

So I started my search for a cheap and trustworthy SSL company which brought me to SSLs.com! The differences… All you can think of!A good aftersales, they do understand you! A perfect and FAST Support! And this all for almost nothing … 5 dollars a year … I hope they keep it as good as is!

Review.Titre: I needed some help from Support and…
Review.Contenu: I needed some help from Support and they were quick to reply and helped me solve the problem.I do think that the install steps are a little confusing. When I copied the email confirm code to my clipboard the site asked if I copied it. I said yes and it went green. But the code was on my clipboard not pasted into the form on that site. I thought the site just saw it on the clipboard.If it goes green, it should actually run a check. Maybe the language could change to not say Copied, but say did you complete going to the form and paste the code or something more clear. I waited about 3 hours for the page to "authenticate" and it was just not a clear message. That said the price and support was excellent.

His professionalism, expertise, and dedication reflect positively on your organization.Thank you once again for providing exceptional service, and I look forward to engaging with SSls.com in the future.
